alert.note: Alert for Baker; Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Eastern Clay; Inland Nassau; Western Clay; Western Duval; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 23 at 3:40PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Nassau, eastern Bradford, northeastern Alachua, southeastern Baker, northwestern Putnam, Clay and southwestern Duval Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 340 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Maxville to near Camp Blanding to near Orange Heights. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Starke, Keystone Heights, Melrose, Middleburg, Macclenny, Glen St. Mary, Maxville, Oakleaf Plantation, Lake Geneva and Camp Blanding. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for northeastern Florida.

area.areaDesc: Baker; Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Eastern Clay; Inland Nassau; Western Clay; Western Duval; Western Putnam
